entry.title: iSperm Medical - Home
entry.summary: Leading provider of Computer-Assisted Sperm Analysis (CASA) systems for clinical and veterinary applications.

entry.title: About Us - iSperm Medical
entry.summary: Learn about iSperm Medical and our commitment to delivering cutting-edge technology solutions in semen analysis.

entry.title: Products - CASA Systems
entry.summary: Explore our comprehensive range of CASA systems including Nexus Dx1, MSQA-100, and SQA-6100vet.

entry.title: Nexus Dx1 - Professional CASA System
entry.summary: Fully automated professional CASA system for human semen analysis with WHO 6th Edition compliance and advanced AI morphology analysis.

entry.title: MSQA-100 - Portable Home-Use CASA System
entry.summary: Portable, home-use Computer-Assisted Sperm Analysis system designed for fast, accurate, and user-friendly semen evaluation.

entry.title: SQA-6100VET - Veterinary CASA System
entry.summary: Multi-species CASA system for professional veterinary breeding soundness examination with built-in heating stage and automated sperm analysis.

entry.title: Knowledge Hub - CASA Standards & Guidelines
entry.summary: Comprehensive knowledge hub covering WHO 6th Edition standards, ISO guidelines, and veterinary semen analysis protocols.

entry.title: Contact Us - iSperm Medical
entry.summary: Get in touch with iSperm Medical for product inquiries, technical support, and partnership opportunities.
